title: A friend of mine has basically proded a bear friend of his to message me.
body:
GD.

This is what we call: "This ain't gonna end well".

My mood is like a fucking Rollercoaster and if talk remember my post yesterday my head space is about at Saturn.  Not here. At all.

And then today at like 1:00 I found out that apparently our division is getting WAYYYYY MOREEEEE funding. And new laptops and new everything. 

So Rollercoaster + a 6'4 beautiful bear? GGet

Gg.

My friend didn't even tell me he was going to hurl a bear at me today.
